data.title: Authorities assure Koh Phangan is safe
data.description: Security authorities in Surat Thani province have offered assurances that  Koh Phangan  is safe, dismissing reports about a possible  terror plot  against  Israelis  on the tourist island as untrue.

data.title: True Corp Showcases Emergency Alert System with Live Test
data.description: True Corporation Plc., Thailand’s leading telecom-tech company, conducted a live demonstration of its “LIVE – Cell Broadcast Service,” showcasing the system’s readiness for the Committee on Communications, Telecommunications, and Digital Economy and Society of the House of Representatives. The event welcomed Mr Pakornwut Udompipatskul, (Second) Vice-Chairperson of the Committee, along with subcommittee members, to witness and participate in testing the emergency alert system, which will be launched in Thailand for the first time. Attendees also toured the Business and Network Intelligence Centre (BNIC), which is utilised for disaster management.

data.title: Ammonia leak at Pattani ice plant sickens 18
data.description: PATTANI - Local residents were evacuated and schools closed after an ammonia leak at an ice plant sickened 18 people in Muang district of this southern border province on Wednesday.

data.title: Trump taps billionaire Musk to overhaul government
data.description: US President-elect Donald Trump has named Elon Musk to a role aimed at creating a more efficient government, handing even more influence to the world’s richest man who donated millions of dollars to helping Trump get elected.

data.title: Taiwan Excellence’s Day of Giving: Waste to Solutions
data.description: Taiwan Excellence brought together over 100 dedicated volunteers for the Day of Giving project, a corporate social responsibility (CSR) initiative focused on uplifting communities and protecting the environment. Aligned with Taiwan Excellence’s mission to support impactful CSR activities annually, this year’s Day of Giving emphasised environmental conservation and community empowerment. Volunteers learned innovative methods to turn waste into resources, helping to reduce pollution, safeguard natural water sources, and create sustainable income for local communities.

data.title: Cabinet to discuss appointing Thai JTC next week for Cambodia talks
data.description: Government maintains MOU44 a key instrument for maritime negotiations

data.title: Moo Deng song ready to top the charts
data.description: The world’s most famous baby hippo is ready to conquer the music world with the release of her first song, Moodeng Moodeng — in four languages to delight global fans.

data.title: Get up! Sitting long hours can be very dangerous, warns ThaiHealth
data.description: With sedentary behaviour on the rise – now averaging over 14 hours a day – the foundation is calling for inclusive policies that support physical activity, particularly among children

data.title: Surachate loses court battle against his dismissal
data.description: The Supreme Administrative Court rules the former deputy police chief’s sacking was within the realm of law, eliminating his only chance of returning to the force

data.title: Industry watchdog filed over 500 cases over imports and quality
data.description: THB395 million worth of substandard products targeted over 12 months

data.title: More bus and train services arranged on Loy Krathong day: Suriya
data.description: Transport minister says arrangements also made for tighter security

data.title: Phase 2 of 10,000-baht handout may go digital: Pichai
data.description: The finance minister said the economic stimulus committee will meet next week to discuss the launch of the second phase of the scheme

data.title: Manila: ‘No objection’ if Duterte surrenders to international court
data.description: MANILA - The Philippine government will not stand in the way if former president Rodrigo Duterte decides to surrender himself to the International Criminal Court (ICC), the office of the current president said on Wednesday.

data.title: Funai factory's closure throws 831 out of work
data.description: More than 800 people have been thrown out of work by the abrupt closure of audio-video equipment manufacturer Funai (Thailand) Co in Nakhon Ratchasima.

data.title: Go green this Loy Krathong, urge Thai authorities
data.description: Float just one krathong per family or opt for virtual ones, advises climate change department in a bid to minimise the impact on rivers and waterways

data.title: BTS Group has received the CAC certification for the fourth consecutive year, reinforcing its commitment to good governance
data.description: On November 11, 2024, BTS Group Holdings Public Company Limited (BTS Group), represented by Ms. Sinatta Kiewkhong, Director of Investor Relations and Director of Sustainability, received its certification of membership in the Thai Private Sector Collective Action Against Corruption (CAC) at the “CAC Certification Ceremony 2/2024 NAVIGATING ESG: THE POWER OF INTEGRITY” held at the Siam Kempinski Hotel.

data.title: Funai factory's closure throwns 831 out of work
data.description: More than 800 people have been thrown out of work by the abrupt closure of audio-video equipment manufacturer Funai (Thailand) Co in Nakhon Ratchasima.

data.title: Whooping cough vaccine urged for children
data.description: The Ministry of Public Health is encouraging people, especially children and those in physical contact with them, to get vaccinated against  whooping cough , after it started spreading in a Bangkok school.

data.title: Funai factory's closure throwns 831 out of work
data.description: More than 800 people have been thrown out of work by the abrupt closure of audio-video equipment manufacturer Funai (Thailand) Co in Nakhon Ratchasima.

data.title: GET Venture Drives Growth for Thai SMEs
data.description: GET Venture has announced an ambitious growth trajectory for 2024, with Chief Executive Officer Mr. Natt Kasemakrakvipas sharing optimistic insights. This year is set to be transformative for GET Venture, as the firm aims to achieve a 300 million THB investment portfolio in 2024, with a target of reaching 750 million THB by 2025.

data.title: Five Star Chicken: Elevating Thai soft power through irresistible flavors
data.description: Thai cuisine stands as one of Thailand's most powerful and effective forms of soft power on the global stage. More than just a tourist attraction, it serves as a cultural ambassador that draws international visitors into Thailand's rich heritage and way of life. Each Thai dish tells a story deeply rooted in Thai traditions, lifestyle, and ancestral wisdom, transforming every meal into a profound cultural experience.

data.title: Illegally kept deer found at accused fengshui master’s house
data.description: CHIANG MAI - Police found an unregistered barking deer, a protected species, at the house of the fengshui consultant arrested for allegedly defrauding people of over 100 million baht.

data.title: Chiang Mai Airbnb searches surge nearly 30% for Loy Krathong stays
data.description: Interest in travel to Chiang Mai amongst international guests remains undimmed, according to Airbnb's most recent search data.
